mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (commentid, nctmember_id, userid, parents_id, contents, depth, is_deleted, regdate) VALUES (comments_seq.NEXTVAL, #{nctmember_id}, #{userid}, #{parents_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{contents}, #{depth}, #{is_deleted}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT commentid, nctmember_id, userid, parents_id, contents, depth, is_deleted, regdate FROM comments WHERE nctmember_id = #{nctmember_id} ORDER BY CASE WHEN depth = 2 THEN regdate END ASC, regdate DESC
